title: Zika: Silent long-term circulation in Thailand

title_detail.value: Zika: Silent long-term circulation in Thailand

summary: In an attempt to shed light on Zika circulation, scientists decided to investigate the history of the Zika virus in Thailand. They discovered that it has been circulating in the country for at least 16 years and probably longer.

summary_detail.value: In an attempt to shed light on Zika circulation, scientists decided to investigate the history of the Zika virus in Thailand. They discovered that it has been circulating in the country for at least 16 years and probably longer.
